From: Vergil Chames [mailto:vchames@vergilchames.com] Sent: Monday, April 08, 2013 12:43 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Introduction to your new Business Manager Thanks!! On Mon, Apr 8, 2013 at 11:41 AM, <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote: Dear Vergil, It has been a real pleasure discussing how MBO Partners will simplify your life and further accelerate your career success. You are now ready to take the next step, and so I'd like to introduce you to your Business Manager, Meghan Moul, who will be responsible for your day-to-day operational support. They will be contacting you soon, however, should you have any questions they can be reached directly at (703) 793-6359 <tel:%28703%29%20793-6359> or mmoul@mbopartners.com <mailto:mmoul@mbopartners.com>.
